name: virtual-transactions
description: Virtual transactions project with public form, admin dashboard, and secure API

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=client && npm run build --workspace=api && npm run build --workspace=functions
scripts.build:functions: npm run build --workspace=api && npm run build --workspace=functions
scripts.deploy:hosting: npm run build:client && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:functions: npm run build:functions && firebase deploy --only functions
